properties.Descriptio:
Construction of the Catchpit (2.0 m dia.) with necessary fittings (Without the Pump)

Earth excavation for catchpit and haul the surplus materials up to 30m by Manually.

Dealing with water

150mm x 225mm Random Rubble masonry work in 1:5 cement and sand

properties.Observatio: Reserve land is being illegally acquired because the boundaries are not marked. This area may be about  4 acre of which about 75% are large trees. The spring water flowing from this reserve is used for agricultural purposes.
properties.Descriptio:
Planting trees in the buffer zone

Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5
